t: Filippo Berio - Wikipedia
s: January 14, 2025 - The brand is used for virgin, extra-virgin and 'mild and light' oils, as well as wine vinegar, balsamic vinegar, pesto and olives. A merchant named Filippo Berio first sold oil under his name in Italy in 1850.
